Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine brown-buff. Rectangular stamp with caduceus symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Ierokles. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC CEALEX DI 0382.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (161)
